Question: In September 2007, this person was kicked out of the MTV Video Music Awards ceremony after engaging in a fight with Kid Rock.
Hints: This person released his autobiography, Tommyland and his second solo album, Tommyland: The Ride in 2005.
In November 2007, it was announced by Nikki Sixx that this person was no longer a member of Mötley Crüe.
Mötley Crüe is now on their Saints of Los Angeles Tour, which started on February 2, which includes this person.
